description:
TRAILER UPDATE

- UPD 1 At the request of "aknavj" - I added to the game the ability to zoom out the camera, press the Z key (only web)

STORY

After the brutal World War 3, the land was completely uninhabitable. The remnants of people went to dissect the galaxy in search of a new home. Many space ships went in different directions in order to quickly find a suitable place. Our story began on one of these space ships.

You are a simple cosmo engineer. Your task is to make sure that everything works properly. But on this day, everything went according to a completely different plan. The equipment has lost stability. The entire crew of the ship sleeps in their cryocapsules, the artificial intelligence of the ship has managed to wake only you. You are the last hope of the people of this ship. Make this bucket work!

CONTROLS - WASD or Arrows to move - Interact E - Mouse in mini-game
